00010 #ifndef _d3d9CAPS_H
00011 #define _d3d9CAPS_H
00012 
00013 #ifndef DIRECT3D_VERSION
00014 #define DIRECT3D_VERSION         0x0900
00015 #endif  //DIRECT3D_VERSION
00016 
00017 // include this file content only if compiling for DX9 interfaces
00018 #if(DIRECT3D_VERSION >= 0x0900)
00019 
00020 #if defined(_X86_) || defined(_IA64)
00021 #pragma pack(4)
00022 #endif
00023 
00024 typedef struct _D3DVSHADERCAPS2_0
00025 {
00026         DWORD Caps;
00027         INT DynamicFlowControlDepth;
00028         INT NumTemps;
00029         INT StaticFlowControlDepth;
00030 } D3DVSHADERCAPS2_0;
00031 
00032 #define D3DVS20CAPS_PREDICATION             (1<<0)
00033 
00034 #define D3DVS20_MAX_DYNAMICFLOWCONTROLDEPTH  24
00035 #define D3DVS20_MIN_DYNAMICFLOWCONTROLDEPTH  0
00036 #define D3DVS20_MAX_NUMTEMPS    32
00037 #define D3DVS20_MIN_NUMTEMPS    12
00038 #define D3DVS20_MAX_STATICFLOWCONTROLDEPTH    4
00039 #define D3DVS20_MIN_STATICFLOWCONTROLDEPTH    1
00040 
00041 typedef struct _D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0
00042 {
00043     DWORD Caps;
00044     INT DynamicFlowControlDepth;
00045     INT NumTemps;
00046     INT StaticFlowControlDepth;
00047     INT NumInstructionSlots;
00048 } D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0;
00049 
00050 #define D3DPS20CAPS_ARBITRARYSWIZZLE        (1<<0)
00051 #define D3DPS20CAPS_GRADIENTINSTRUCTIONS    (1<<1)
00052 #define D3DPS20CAPS_PREDICATION             (1<<2)
00053 #define D3DPS20CAPS_NODEPENDENTREADLIMIT    (1<<3)
00054 #define D3DPS20CAPS_NOTEXINSTRUCTIONLIMIT   (1<<4)
00055 
00056 #define D3DPS20_MAX_DYNAMICFLOWCONTROLDEPTH    24
00057 #define D3DPS20_MIN_DYNAMICFLOWCONTROLDEPTH    0
00058 #define D3DPS20_MAX_NUMTEMPS    32
00059 #define D3DPS20_MIN_NUMTEMPS    12
00060 #define D3DPS20_MAX_STATICFLOWCONTROLDEPTH    4
00061 #define D3DPS20_MIN_STATICFLOWCONTROLDEPTH    0
00062 #define D3DPS20_MAX_NUMINSTRUCTIONSLOTS    512
00063 #define D3DPS20_MIN_NUMINSTRUCTIONSLOTS    96
00064 
00065 #define D3DMIN30SHADERINSTRUCTIONS 512
00066 #define D3DMAX30SHADERINSTRUCTIONS 32768
00067 
00068 typedef struct _D3DCAPS9
00069 {
00070     /* Device Info */
00071     D3DDEVTYPE  DeviceType;
00072     UINT        AdapterOrdinal;
00073 
00074     /* Caps from DX7 Draw */
00075     DWORD   Caps;
00076     DWORD   Caps2;
00077     DWORD   Caps3;
00078     DWORD   PresentationIntervals;
00079 
00080     /* Cursor Caps */
00081     DWORD   CursorCaps;
00082 
00083     /* 3D Device Caps */
00084     DWORD   DevCaps;
00085 
00086     DWORD   PrimitiveMiscCaps;
00087     DWORD   RasterCaps;
00088     DWORD   ZCmpCaps;
00089     DWORD   SrcBlendCaps;
00090     DWORD   DestBlendCaps;
00091     DWORD   AlphaCmpCaps;
00092     DWORD   ShadeCaps;
00093     DWORD   TextureCaps;
00094     DWORD   TextureFilterCaps;          // D3DPTFILTERCAPS for IDirect3DTexture9's
00095     DWORD   CubeTextureFilterCaps;      // D3DPTFILTERCAPS for IDirect3DCubeTexture9's
00096     DWORD   VolumeTextureFilterCaps;    // D3DPTFILTERCAPS for IDirect3DVolumeTexture9's
00097     DWORD   TextureAddressCaps;         // D3DPTADDRESSCAPS for IDirect3DTexture9's
00098     DWORD   VolumeTextureAddressCaps;   // D3DPTADDRESSCAPS for IDirect3DVolumeTexture9's
00099 
00100     DWORD   LineCaps;                   // D3DLINECAPS
00101 
00102     DWORD   MaxTextureWidth, MaxTextureHeight;
00103     DWORD   MaxVolumeExtent;
00104 
00105     DWORD   MaxTextureRepeat;
00106     DWORD   MaxTextureAspectRatio;
00107     DWORD   MaxAnisotropy;
00108     float   MaxVertexW;
00109 
00110     float   GuardBandLeft;
00111     float   GuardBandTop;
00112     float   GuardBandRight;
00113     float   GuardBandBottom;
00114 
00115     float   ExtentsAdjust;
00116     DWORD   StencilCaps;
00117 
00118     DWORD   FVFCaps;
00119     DWORD   TextureOpCaps;
00120     DWORD   MaxTextureBlendStages;
00121     DWORD   MaxSimultaneousTextures;
00122 
00123     DWORD   VertexProcessingCaps;
00124     DWORD   MaxActiveLights;
00125     DWORD   MaxUserClipPlanes;
00126     DWORD   MaxVertexBlendMatrices;
00127     DWORD   MaxVertexBlendMatrixIndex;
00128 
00129     float   MaxPointSize;
00130 
00131     DWORD   MaxPrimitiveCount;          // max number of primitives per DrawPrimitive call
00132     DWORD   MaxVertexIndex;
00133     DWORD   MaxStreams;
00134     DWORD   MaxStreamStride;            // max stride for SetStreamSource
00135 
00136     DWORD   VertexShaderVersion;
00137     DWORD   MaxVertexShaderConst;       // number of vertex shader constant registers
00138 
00139     DWORD   PixelShaderVersion;
00140     float   PixelShader1xMaxValue;      // max value storable in registers of ps.1.x shaders
00141 
00142     // Here are the DX9 specific ones
00143     DWORD   DevCaps2;
00144 
00145     float   MaxNpatchTessellationLevel;
00146     DWORD   Reserved5;
00147 
00148     UINT    MasterAdapterOrdinal;       // ordinal of master adaptor for adapter group
00149     UINT    AdapterOrdinalInGroup;      // ordinal inside the adapter group
00150     UINT    NumberOfAdaptersInGroup;    // number of adapters in this adapter group (only if master)
00151     DWORD   DeclTypes;                  // Data types, supported in vertex declarations
00152     DWORD   NumSimultaneousRTs;         // Will be at least 1
00153     DWORD   StretchRectFilterCaps;      // Filter caps supported by StretchRect
00154     D3DVSHADERCAPS2_0 VS20Caps;
00155     D3DPSHADERCAPS2_0 PS20Caps;
00156     DWORD   VertexTextureFilterCaps;    // D3DPTFILTERCAPS for IDirect3DTexture9's for texture, used in vertex shaders
00157     DWORD   MaxVShaderInstructionsExecuted; // maximum number of vertex shader instructions that can be executed
00158     DWORD   MaxPShaderInstructionsExecuted; // maximum number of pixel shader instructions that can be executed
00159     DWORD   MaxVertexShader30InstructionSlots; 
00160     DWORD   MaxPixelShader30InstructionSlots;
00161 } D3DCAPS9;
00162 
00163 //
00164 // BIT DEFINES FOR D3DCAPS9 DWORD MEMBERS
00165 //
00166 
00167 //
00168 // Caps
00169 //
00170 #define D3DCAPS_READ_SCANLINE           0x00020000L
00171 
00172 //
00173 // Caps2
00174 //
00175 #define D3DCAPS2_FULLSCREENGAMMA        0x00020000L
00176 #define D3DCAPS2_CANCALIBRATEGAMMA      0x00100000L
00177 #define D3DCAPS2_RESERVED               0x02000000L
00178 #define D3DCAPS2_CANMANAGERESOURCE      0x10000000L
00179 #define D3DCAPS2_DYNAMICTEXTURES        0x20000000L
00180 #define D3DCAPS2_CANAUTOGENMIPMAP       0x40000000L
00181 
00182 //
00183 // Caps3
00184 //
00185 #define D3DCAPS3_RESERVED               0x8000001fL
00186 
00187 // Indicates that the device can respect the ALPHABLENDENABLE render state
00188 // when fullscreen while using the FLIP or DISCARD swap effect.
00189 // COPY and COPYVSYNC swap effects work whether or not this flag is set.
00190 #define D3DCAPS3_ALPHA_FULLSCREEN_FLIP_OR_DISCARD   0x00000020L
00191 
00192 // Indicates that the device can perform a gamma correction from 
00193 // a windowed back buffer containing linear content to the sRGB desktop.
00194 #define D3DCAPS3_LINEAR_TO_SRGB_PRESENTATION 0x00000080L
00195 
00196 #define D3DCAPS3_COPY_TO_VIDMEM         0x00000100L /* Device can acclerate copies from sysmem to local vidmem */
00197 #define D3DCAPS3_COPY_TO_SYSTEMMEM      0x00000200L /* Device can acclerate copies from local vidmem to sysmem */
00198 
00199 
00200 //
00201 // PresentationIntervals
00202 //
00203 #define D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_DEFAULT     0x00000000L
00204 #define D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_ONE         0x00000001L
00205 #define D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_TWO         0x00000002L
00206 #define D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_THREE       0x00000004L
00207 #define D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_FOUR        0x00000008L
00208 #define D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_IMMEDIATE   0x80000000L
00209 
00210 //
00211 // CursorCaps
00212 //
00213 // Driver supports HW color cursor in at least hi-res modes(height >=400)
00214 #define D3DCURSORCAPS_COLOR             0x00000001L
00215 // Driver supports HW cursor also in low-res modes(height < 400)
00216 #define D3DCURSORCAPS_LOWRES            0x00000002L
00217 
00218 //
00219 // DevCaps
00220 //
00221 #define D3DDEVCAPS_EXECUTESYSTEMMEMORY  0x00000010L /* Device can use execute buffers from system memory */
00222 #define D3DDEVCAPS_EXECUTEVIDEOMEMORY   0x00000020L /* Device can use execute buffers from video memory */
00223 #define D3DDEVCAPS_TLVERTEXSYSTEMMEMORY 0x00000040L /* Device can use TL buffers from system memory */
00224 #define D3DDEVCAPS_TLVERTEXVIDEOMEMORY  0x00000080L /* Device can use TL buffers from video memory */
00225 #define D3DDEVCAPS_TEXTURESYSTEMMEMORY  0x00000100L /* Device can texture from system memory */
00226 #define D3DDEVCAPS_TEXTUREVIDEOMEMORY   0x00000200L /* Device can texture from device memory */
00227 #define D3DDEVCAPS_DRAWPRIMTLVERTEX     0x00000400L /* Device can draw TLVERTEX primitives */
00228 #define D3DDEVCAPS_CANRENDERAFTERFLIP   0x00000800L /* Device can render without waiting for flip to complete */
00229 #define D3DDEVCAPS_TEXTURENONLOCALVIDMEM 0x00001000L /* Device can texture from nonlocal video memory */
00230 #define D3DDEVCAPS_DRAWPRIMITIVES2      0x00002000L /* Device can support DrawPrimitives2 */
00231 #define D3DDEVCAPS_SEPARATETEXTUREMEMORIES 0x00004000L /* Device is texturing from separate memory pools */
00232 #define D3DDEVCAPS_DRAWPRIMITIVES2EX    0x00008000L /* Device can support Extended DrawPrimitives2 i.e. DX7 compliant driver*/
00233 #define D3DDEVCAPS_HWTRANSFORMANDLIGHT  0x00010000L /* Device can support transformation and lighting in hardware and DRAWPRIMITIVES2EX must be also */
00234 #define D3DDEVCAPS_CANBLTSYSTONONLOCAL  0x00020000L /* Device supports a Tex Blt from system memory to non-local vidmem */
00235 #define D3DDEVCAPS_HWRASTERIZATION      0x00080000L /* Device has HW acceleration for rasterization */
00236 #define D3DDEVCAPS_PUREDEVICE           0x00100000L /* Device supports D3DCREATE_PUREDEVICE */
00237 #define D3DDEVCAPS_QUINTICRTPATCHES     0x00200000L /* Device supports quintic Beziers and BSplines */
00238 #define D3DDEVCAPS_RTPATCHES            0x00400000L /* Device supports Rect and Tri patches */
00239 #define D3DDEVCAPS_RTPATCHHANDLEZERO    0x00800000L /* Indicates that RT Patches may be drawn efficiently using handle 0 */
00240 #define D3DDEVCAPS_NPATCHES             0x01000000L /* Device supports N-Patches */
00241 
00242 //
00243 // PrimitiveMiscCaps
00244 //
00245 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_MASKZ              0x00000002L
00246 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_CULLNONE           0x00000010L
00247 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_CULLCW             0x00000020L
00248 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_CULLCCW            0x00000040L
00249 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_COLORWRITEENABLE   0x00000080L
00250 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_CLIPPLANESCALEDPOINTS 0x00000100L /* Device correctly clips scaled points to clip planes */
00251 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_CLIPTLVERTS        0x00000200L /* device will clip post-transformed vertex primitives */
00252 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_TSSARGTEMP         0x00000400L /* device supports D3DTA_TEMP for temporary register */
00253 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_BLENDOP            0x00000800L /* device supports D3DRS_BLENDOP */
00254 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_NULLREFERENCE      0x00001000L /* Reference Device that doesnt render */
00255 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_INDEPENDENTWRITEMASKS     0x00004000L /* Device supports independent write masks for MET or MRT */
00256 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_PERSTAGECONSTANT   0x00008000L /* Device supports per-stage constants */
00257 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_FOGANDSPECULARALPHA   0x00010000L /* Device supports separate fog and specular alpha (many devices
00258                                                           use the specular alpha channel to store fog factor) */
00259 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_SEPARATEALPHABLEND         0x00020000L /* Device supports separate blend settings for the alpha channel */
00260 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_MRTINDEPENDENTBITDEPTHS    0x00040000L /* Device supports different bit depths for MRT */
00261 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_MRTPOSTPIXELSHADERBLENDING 0x00080000L /* Device supports post-pixel shader operations for MRT */
00262 #define D3DPMISCCAPS_FOGVERTEXCLAMPED           0x00100000L /* Device clamps fog blend factor per vertex */
00263 
00264 //
00265 // LineCaps
00266 //
00267 #define D3DLINECAPS_TEXTURE             0x00000001L
00268 #define D3DLINECAPS_ZTEST               0x00000002L
00269 #define D3DLINECAPS_BLEND               0x00000004L
00270 #define D3DLINECAPS_ALPHACMP            0x00000008L
00271 #define D3DLINECAPS_FOG                 0x00000010L
00272 #define D3DLINECAPS_ANTIALIAS           0x00000020L
00273 
00274 //
00275 // RasterCaps
00276 //
00277 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_DITHER                 0x00000001L
00278 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_ZTEST                  0x00000010L
00279 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_FOGVERTEX              0x00000080L
00280 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_FOGTABLE               0x00000100L
00281 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_MIPMAPLODBIAS          0x00002000L
00282 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_ZBUFFERLESSHSR         0x00008000L
00283 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_FOGRANGE               0x00010000L
00284 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_ANISOTROPY             0x00020000L
00285 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_WBUFFER                0x00040000L
00286 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_WFOG                   0x00100000L
00287 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_ZFOG                   0x00200000L
00288 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_COLORPERSPECTIVE       0x00400000L /* Device iterates colors perspective correct */
00289 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_SCISSORTEST            0x01000000L
00290 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_SLOPESCALEDEPTHBIAS    0x02000000L
00291 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_DEPTHBIAS              0x04000000L 
00292 #define D3DPRASTERCAPS_MULTISAMPLE_TOGGLE     0x08000000L
00293 
00294 //
00295 // ZCmpCaps, AlphaCmpCaps
00296 //
00297 #define D3DPCMPCAPS_NEVER               0x00000001L
00298 #define D3DPCMPCAPS_LESS                0x00000002L
00299 #define D3DPCMPCAPS_EQUAL               0x00000004L
00300 #define D3DPCMPCAPS_LESSEQUAL           0x00000008L
00301 #define D3DPCMPCAPS_GREATER             0x00000010L
00302 #define D3DPCMPCAPS_NOTEQUAL            0x00000020L
00303 #define D3DPCMPCAPS_GREATEREQUAL        0x00000040L
00304 #define D3DPCMPCAPS_ALWAYS              0x00000080L
00305 
00306 //
00307 // SourceBlendCaps, DestBlendCaps
00308 //
00309 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_ZERO              0x00000001L
00310 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_ONE               0x00000002L
00311 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_SRCCOLOR          0x00000004L
00312 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_INVSRCCOLOR       0x00000008L
00313 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_SRCALPHA          0x00000010L
00314 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_INVSRCALPHA       0x00000020L
00315 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_DESTALPHA         0x00000040L
00316 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_INVDESTALPHA      0x00000080L
00317 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_DESTCOLOR         0x00000100L
00318 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_INVDESTCOLOR      0x00000200L
00319 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_SRCALPHASAT       0x00000400L
00320 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_BOTHSRCALPHA      0x00000800L
00321 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_BOTHINVSRCALPHA   0x00001000L
00322 #define D3DPBLENDCAPS_BLENDFACTOR       0x00002000L /* Supports both D3DBLEND_BLENDFACTOR and D3DBLEND_INVBLENDFACTOR */
00323 
00324 //
00325 // ShadeCaps
00326 //
00327 #define D3DPSHADECAPS_COLORGOURAUDRGB       0x00000008L
00328 #define D3DPSHADECAPS_SPECULARGOURAUDRGB    0x00000200L
00329 #define D3DPSHADECAPS_ALPHAGOURAUDBLEND     0x00004000L
00330 #define D3DPSHADECAPS_FOGGOURAUD            0x00080000L
00331 
00332 //
00333 // TextureCaps
00334 //
00335 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_PERSPECTIVE         0x00000001L /* Perspective-correct texturing is supported */
00336 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_POW2                0x00000002L /* Power-of-2 texture dimensions are required - applies to non-Cube/Volume textures only. */
00337 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_ALPHA               0x00000004L /* Alpha in texture pixels is supported */
00338 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_SQUAREONLY          0x00000020L /* Only square textures are supported */
00339 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_TEXREPEATNOTSCALEDBYSIZE 0x00000040L /* Texture indices are not scaled by the texture size prior to interpolation */
00340 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_ALPHAPALETTE        0x00000080L /* Device can draw alpha from texture palettes */
00341 // Device can use non-POW2 textures if:
00342 //  1) D3DTEXTURE_ADDRESS is set to CLAMP for this texture's stage
00343 //  2) D3DRS_WRAP(N) is zero for this texture's coordinates
00344 //  3) mip mapping is not enabled (use magnification filter only)
00345 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_NONPOW2CONDITIONAL  0x00000100L
00346 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_PROJECTED           0x00000400L /* Device can do D3DTTFF_PROJECTED */
00347 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_CUBEMAP             0x00000800L /* Device can do cubemap textures */
00348 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_VOLUMEMAP           0x00002000L /* Device can do volume textures */
00349 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_MIPMAP              0x00004000L /* Device can do mipmapped textures */
00350 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_MIPVOLUMEMAP        0x00008000L /* Device can do mipmapped volume textures */
00351 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_MIPCUBEMAP          0x00010000L /* Device can do mipmapped cube maps */
00352 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_CUBEMAP_POW2        0x00020000L /* Device requires that cubemaps be power-of-2 dimension */
00353 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_VOLUMEMAP_POW2      0x00040000L /* Device requires that volume maps be power-of-2 dimension */
00354 #define D3DPTEXTURECAPS_NOPROJECTEDBUMPENV  0x00200000L /* Device does not support projected bump env lookup operation 
00355                                                            in programmable and fixed function pixel shaders */
00356 
00357 //
00358 // TextureFilterCaps, StretchRectFilterCaps
00359 //
00360 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MINFPOINT           0x00000100L /* Min Filter */
00361 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MINFLINEAR          0x00000200L
00362 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MINFANISOTROPIC     0x00000400L
00363 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MINFPYRAMIDALQUAD   0x00000800L
00364 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MINFGAUSSIANQUAD    0x00001000L
00365 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MIPFPOINT           0x00010000L /* Mip Filter */
00366 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MIPFLINEAR          0x00020000L
00367 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MAGFPOINT           0x01000000L /* Mag Filter */
00368 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MAGFLINEAR          0x02000000L
00369 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MAGFANISOTROPIC     0x04000000L
00370 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MAGFPYRAMIDALQUAD   0x08000000L
00371 #define D3DPTFILTERCAPS_MAGFGAUSSIANQUAD    0x10000000L
00372 
00373 //
00374 // TextureAddressCaps
00375 //
00376 #define D3DPTADDRESSCAPS_WRAP           0x00000001L
00377 #define D3DPTADDRESSCAPS_MIRROR         0x00000002L
00378 #define D3DPTADDRESSCAPS_CLAMP          0x00000004L
00379 #define D3DPTADDRESSCAPS_BORDER         0x00000008L
00380 #define D3DPTADDRESSCAPS_INDEPENDENTUV  0x00000010L
00381 #define D3DPTADDRESSCAPS_MIRRORONCE     0x00000020L
00382 
00383 //
00384 // StencilCaps
00385 //
00386 #define D3DSTENCILCAPS_KEEP             0x00000001L
00387 #define D3DSTENCILCAPS_ZERO             0x00000002L
00388 #define D3DSTENCILCAPS_REPLACE          0x00000004L
00389 #define D3DSTENCILCAPS_INCRSAT          0x00000008L
00390 #define D3DSTENCILCAPS_DECRSAT          0x00000010L
00391 #define D3DSTENCILCAPS_INVERT           0x00000020L
00392 #define D3DSTENCILCAPS_INCR             0x00000040L
00393 #define D3DSTENCILCAPS_DECR             0x00000080L
00394 #define D3DSTENCILCAPS_TWOSIDED         0x00000100L
00395 
00396 //
00397 // TextureOpCaps
00398 //
00399 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_DISABLE                    0x00000001L
00400 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_SELECTARG1                 0x00000002L
00401 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_SELECTARG2                 0x00000004L
00402 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_MODULATE                   0x00000008L
00403 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_MODULATE2X                 0x00000010L
00404 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_MODULATE4X                 0x00000020L
00405 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_ADD                        0x00000040L
00406 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_ADDSIGNED                  0x00000080L
00407 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_ADDSIGNED2X                0x00000100L
00408 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_SUBTRACT                   0x00000200L
00409 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_ADDSMOOTH                  0x00000400L
00410 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_BLENDDIFFUSEALPHA          0x00000800L
00411 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_BLENDTEXTUREALPHA          0x00001000L
00412 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_BLENDFACTORALPHA           0x00002000L
00413 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_BLENDTEXTUREALPHAPM        0x00004000L
00414 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_BLENDCURRENTALPHA          0x00008000L
00415 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_PREMODULATE                0x00010000L
00416 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_MODULATEALPHA_ADDCOLOR     0x00020000L
00417 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_MODULATECOLOR_ADDALPHA     0x00040000L
00418 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_MODULATEINVALPHA_ADDCOLOR  0x00080000L
00419 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_MODULATEINVCOLOR_ADDALPHA  0x00100000L
00420 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_BUMPENVMAP                 0x00200000L
00421 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_BUMPENVMAPLUMINANCE        0x00400000L
00422 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_DOTPRODUCT3                0x00800000L
00423 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_MULTIPLYADD                0x01000000L
00424 #define D3DTEXOPCAPS_LERP                       0x02000000L
00425 
00426 //
00427 // FVFCaps
00428 //
00429 #define D3DFVFCAPS_TEXCOORDCOUNTMASK    0x0000ffffL /* mask for texture coordinate count field */
00430 #define D3DFVFCAPS_DONOTSTRIPELEMENTS   0x00080000L /* Device prefers that vertex elements not be stripped */
00431 #define D3DFVFCAPS_PSIZE                0x00100000L /* Device can receive point size */
00432 
00433 //
00434 // VertexProcessingCaps
00435 //
00436 #define D3DVTXPCAPS_TEXGEN              0x00000001L /* device can do texgen */
00437 #define D3DVTXPCAPS_MATERIALSOURCE7     0x00000002L /* device can do DX7-level colormaterialsource ops */
00438 #define D3DVTXPCAPS_DIRECTIONALLIGHTS   0x00000008L /* device can do directional lights */
00439 #define D3DVTXPCAPS_POSITIONALLIGHTS    0x00000010L /* device can do positional lights (includes point and spot) */
00440 #define D3DVTXPCAPS_LOCALVIEWER         0x00000020L /* device can do local viewer */
00441 #define D3DVTXPCAPS_TWEENING            0x00000040L /* device can do vertex tweening */

00443 #define D3DVTXPCAPS_NO_TEXGEN_NONLOCALVIEWER   0x00000200L /* device does not support TexGen in non-local
00444                                                             viewer mode */
